Sequence Information.Function: Exerts, in vitro, a potent antimicrobial activity. Probably due to an impairment of the function of the respiratory chain and of energy-dependent activities in the inner membrane of susceptible microorganisms.

Literature.Title: Molecular cloning of Bac7, a proline- and arginine-rich antimicrobial peptide from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Zanetti M.,Romeo D.,Scocchi M.

Literature.Title: Amino acid sequences of two proline-rich bactenecins. Antimicrobial peptides of bovine neutrophils.

Literature.Title: Purification and structural characterization of bovine cathelicidins, precursors of antimicrobial peptides.
